item.title: 【Helpdesk】How to convert and split TrueHD and DTS in WAVs with FFMPEG
item.description:
Before start, download FFMPEG from

https://ffmpeg.org/download.html#build-windows

and then create with Notepad batch files with code

if you want to convert TrueHD to WAV (audio.thd > audio.wav)
ffmpeg -i audio.thd audio.wav

if you want to convert DTS to WAV (audio.dts > audio.wav)
ffmpeg -i audio.dts audio.wav

if you want to split a 5.1 WAV file into per-channel files
FL (front left) / FR (front right) / FC (center) / LFE (subwoofer) / BL (back left) / BR (back right)
ffmpeg -i audio.wav -filter_complex "channelsplit=channel_layout=5.1[FL][FR][FC][LFE][BL][BR]" -map "[FL]" 01L(FrontLeft).wav -map "[FR]" 02R(FrontRight).wav -map "[FC]" 03C(FrontCenter).wav -map "[LFE]" 04LFE(LFE).wav -map "[BL]" 07LRS(LeftBack).wav -map "[BR]" 08RLS(RightBack).wav

if you want to split a 7.1 WAV file into per-channel files
FL (front left) / FR (front right) / FC (center) / LFE (subwoofer) / BL (back left) / BR (back right) / SL (side left) /
SR (side right)
ffmpeg -i audio.wav -filter_complex "channelsplit=channel_layout=7.1[FL][FR][FC][LFE][BL][BR][SL][SR]" -map "[FL]" 01L(FrontLeft).wav -map "[FR]" 02R(FrontRight).wav -map "[FC]" 03C(FrontCenter).wav -map "[LFE]" 04LFE(LFE).wav -map "[BL]" 07LRS(LeftBack).wav -map "[BR]" 08RLS(RightBack).wav -map "[SL]" 05LS(LeftSide).wav -map "[SR]" 06RS(RightSide).wav

NOTE: FFMPEG and all audio files must be in same directory.
